description:
Streamline your systems management

Scan, collect, and organize your on-prem Windows machines so deployments go exactly where you need them to with PDQ Inventory.
Improvements
- Force Update of existing installed 3rd party libraries for new certificate
- Inventory: Updated to better support accessibility needs
- Deploy: Added support for library packages over 2gb
- Deploy: Updated to better support accessibility needs

Bug Fixes
- Updated Email OAuth2 credentials scope for multi-user environments
- Fixed email attachment MIME types for all file types in auto-reports and notifications
- Fixed an issue that caused slow loading when searching in the treegrid for users in limited internet access environments
- Deploy: Additional Bug Fix for where steps column did not update as a package was being deployed
- Inventory: Updated to prevent deletion of a computer while editing a collection to prevent data inconsistencies
